title: The Father Who Moves Mountains
short_cast: Adrian Titieni, Elena Purea, Judith State, Valeriu Andriuță, Tudor Smoleanu, Virgil Aioanei, Radu Botar, Petronela Grigorescu, Bogdan Nechifor, Cristian Bota

desc: When his son goes missing during a snowy hike in the mountains, a retired intelligence officer will stop at nothing — and risk everything — to find him.
